item.title: R package for Analytics automation
item.description: The challenge When working in BICC - VPBank, there are some common questions that a data science team has to solve: How could I find potential customers for a given product? What does it look like the frequent patterns of customers? What is the retention rate/ cohort behaviour of customers? What does the customer behavior flows look like? How does one variable differ among various group? and many other analytics questions.
